mapper.update:
update warehouse
warehouse_code = #{warehouseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
warehouse_name = #{warehouseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
logistics_center_code = #{logisticsCenterCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
logistics_center_name = #{logisticsCenterName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
warehouse_type_name = #{warehouseTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
warehouse_type_code = #{warehouseTypeCode,jdbcType=TINYINT},
province_code = #{provinceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
province_name = #{provinceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
city_code = #{cityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
city_name = #{cityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
county_code = #{countyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
county_name = #{countyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
detailed_address = #{detailedAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contact = #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
enable = #{enable,jdbcType=TINYINT},
del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT},
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
warehouse_order = #{warehouseOrder,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_purchase = #{isPurchase,jdbcType=INTEGER},
batch_manage = #{batchManage,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select
from warehouse where warehouse_code = #{warehouseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and enable=0 order by warehouse_order asc

select
from warehouse where enable =0
and province_code like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{provinceCode},'%'))
and city_code like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{cityCode},'%'))
and county_code like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{countyCode},'%'))
and company_code = #{companyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
order by warehouse_order asc

select warehouse_code as warehouseCode, warehouse_name as warehouseName, logistics_center_code as logisticsCenterCode, logistics_center_name as logisticsCenterName, batch_manage batchManage from warehouse where warehouse_name = #{warehouseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by warehouse_order asc

select
from warehouse where enable = 0 and batch_manage in (1,2)

select
from warehouse where del_flag=0 and enable=0 and batch_manage in (2,4,6)

select distinct warehouse_name warehouseName, warehouse_code warehouseCode, warehouse_type_code warehouseType, logistics_center_code stockCode, logistics_center_name stockName from warehouse where warehouse_code = #{warehouseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select
from warehouse where enable = 0 and wms_warehouse_id = #{wmsWarehouseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
